hazards.resourceCost: Extensive damage to the ship has resulted in a rupture in the fuel handling system, VALUE fuel has been lost
heavy damage to the ship has brought about an uncontrolled power discharge, VALUE energy has been lost

injury.description: Depressurization has resulted from the ships poor condition, you suffer VALUE damage from oxygen deprivation
injury.gameover: Depressurization has resulted from the ships poor condition, you do not survive
